thread.title: Negotiators tight-lipped after unofficial Korea nuclear talks

title: Negotiators tight-lipped after unofficial Korea nuclear talks
text:
Negotiators tight-lipped after unofficial Korea nuclear talks 5:12pm GMT - 01:32 
Informal meetings between the United States, North Korea, and South Korea were called ''constructive'' by their Finland hosts, but it's unclear to what, if any, progress may have been made. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Informal meetings between the United States, North Korea, and South Korea were called "constructive" by their Finland hosts, but it's unclear to what, if any, progress may have been made.
